abstract: Details of the government’s plan to fix problems at the country’s banks brought a glimmer of hope for a recovery to Wall Street.
snippet: Details of the government’s plan to fix problems at the country’s banks brought a glimmer of hope for a recovery to Wall Street.
lead_paragraph: Details of the government’s plans to clean up the nation’s banks ignited a blazing stock market rally on Monday, lifting Wall Street to its best one-day performance in five months and tempting some investors to imagine what they would not have dared just a few weeks ago  that the worst may finally be over.

headline.main: Banking Plan Propels Wall St. to Best Day in Months
headline.print_headline: Rally on Banking Plan Propels Wall St. to Best Day in Months
